title: Draven Day Icons
body:
Hi, 

I was just wondering if anyone had received the icons from the Draven Day event yet, or are they still to be rolled out?

Thanks you

replies.body: They said they are still giving them out by the 25th.
Yup, official announcement via banner on the [Riot support site. ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us)
Thank you both for the info on this much my appreciated
